alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:19PM CDT until April 13 at 11:48AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Hale, Sumter, Marengo and Greene Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Monday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Monday night to late Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 61.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 69.1 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
